about_the_game:
After being Iced by the Syndicate, the governing police force of the Keld District, Willem awakens. Tasked with eradicating a pest problem, a Departed outbreak in Borough 563; our story begins.

“You’ve been Iced Willem. Amnesia is a common side effect after a transfer of consciousness. The process is rather invasive. It will pass. I need to run you through a few checks before we move ahead to ensure all your Unit's features are in operable, working order.”

“The poor live here. People who can’t afford to live above ground. Addicts mainly. Society's rejects.”

Harken back to the roots of Survival Horror. Ammo is scarce, enemies are tough. You will struggle to survive. Manage your inventory, conserve ammo, be cautious and you may stand a chance. The people here, they aren’t what they seem.

Key Features

  • A living breathing world, interact with the residents of Borough 563 and explore it's open ended environment.
  • A pure survival horror experience, drawing inspiration from classics of the past.
  • Robust, intuitive and polished third person combat.
  • A unique and fully voice acted story.
  • A grid based inventory system with a twist.
  • Grotesque enemies and encounters.
  • Puzzles to solve and dungeons to explore.
  • Mysteries for you, the player to uncover.

content_descriptors.notes: Drug abuse, self harm, potentially offensive conversations
